title: LF Ranked duo partner Bronze/Silver
body:
Hello there, i'm a B3 jungle main and I can play Elise, Graves and Kindred very well. I can also play any other roles except for support pretty decently as well. I've been to silver 5 before but I've been having bad luck with my ranked matched so I stopped playing for a while after I get demoted to B3. I'm not very salty usually and I don't flame people. I don't get easily tilted too so if you're interested hit me up.

IGN: Salyer

replies.body: I'd love to play too. bronze 3 and recently demoted from bronze 2. i main mid and top, can play jg without feeding, can play supp without feeding BUT cant play ADC properly. I play almost every mage well and almost everyone assassin well. Mostly playing {{champion:157}}  and {{champion:268}}  lately, can play some carry tanks as well e.g. {{champion:122}}

i main mid and top i can sup pretty good too am bronze 5 but was about to hit silver 5 last season heres my champ pool
